title: of the powers conferred on me by section 87 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Medical
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Medical 

Examinations) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited merchant shipping (medical examinations) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 87 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: 2. Regulation 10(1) of the Merchant Shipping (Medical Examinations)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 10(1) of the Merchant Shipping (Medical Examinations) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 246 of 2014) is amended by substituting for 
subparagraph (c) the following: 

has had his or her medical fitness certificate suspended or revoked 

“(c) 
pursuant to Regulation 9,”. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 29 July 2025 

SEÁN CANNEY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [371] 3

title: of the powers conferred on me by section 87 of the Merchant Shipping Act 2010
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Merchant Shipping (Medical Examinations) 
Regulations 2014 to allow a person to appeal a decision to have his or her 
medical fitness certificate suspended regardless of the time period for which the 
certificate is suspended. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [371]
